messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Response to digest 793
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/15/2000 6:14:01 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... LOL about the peddle! I totally forgot DS had sewn several little bags with handles when he
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/15/2000 6:14:01 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
oilmagic@... writes:

> My son has been sewing with me for a while using the
> electic machine. Mostly he just pushes the
> peddle and pretends he's driving a car. He has also sewn a little bag
> for himself.

LOL about the peddle!

I totally forgot DS had sewn several little bags with handles when he was 6.
Gee, this project will be even easier than I thought, the kid already knows
how to operate the sewing machine. No wonder he has been so impatient with
me. Here I am thinking I've got to start from scratch and he's already had
the basics.

(Make memo to self: Must find brain soon!)

Eiraul
